DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether pulsatile cup cup device effective treatment patient chronic low back pain compare cup minimal cupping .
DOC.criteria: Male female , 1865 year Chronic low back pain ( disease duration > 3 month ) Pain intensity visual analogue scale inclusion > 40 mm ( 0100 mm scale ) Only pharmacological treatment NSAID treatment last 4 week Undersigned informed consent form Use anticoagulant ( Phenprocoumon , Heparin ) Coagulopathy Cupping last 6 week Other CAM therapy last 12 week ( e.g . acupuncture ) Physical therapy last 12 week ( e.g . massage , osteopathy ) participation another study last 3 month Paracetamol allergy intolerance Pathological neurological symptom muscular paralysis paraesthesia due spinal disc herniation cause Known renal / hepatic disease Intake central nervous systemacting analgesic last 6 week Applying early retirement due low back pain Severe disease allow participation No undersign informed consent form
